DOC.brief_summary: Since the 2000s, the experiences of children and especially their fear during a consultation, a treatment or examination is food for thought in our establishment. There is no tool validated self-assessment of fear to 6 faces. It therefore appeared necessary to us to create this tool. The scale self-assessment of the fear that we have developed consists of six faces representing a gradual level of fear: the child can easily describe their level of fear, which allows for appropriate care.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of a Scale of Self-assessment of Fear Faces in Children 4 to 12 Years
DOC.criteria: Children aged 4 to 12 years. Enrolled in one of the participating institutions in the study (steps 15) or consultant pediatric emergencies at the Children of Limoges (step 6). Authorization of at least one person having parental authority for the child to participate in the study. Children affiliates or benefiting from a social security Children with psychomotor disorders that prevent the use of the scale studied and understanding instructions. Children in vital emergency
